name: the hunger the thirst and the dead
name_original: the hunger the thirst and the dead
description:
Survive for as long as possible in your woodland mansion , and remember to stay hydrated and don't go hungry ! 

Controls :

The usual WASD to move around ,move your mouse to rotate ,and right click to shoot

Notes : 

Sorry about the weird FOV with prevents you from seeing your stats . will Fix in a future update .
